DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to evaluate the overall effectiveness of 8 week of aripiprazole treatment.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Aripiprazole in Patients With Schizophrenia in General Psychiatric Practices
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder being treated as outpatients,no response to past antipsychotic treatment and patients who symptoms are notoptimally controlled defined as CGI S<7 pregnant or breastfeeding,patients at risk for committing suicide,diagnosis of mood disorders, delirium, dementia and other cognitive disorders,patients treatment resistant to otherantipyschotic medications and treatment with a long acting psychotic in which the last dose was within 3 months of treatment phase
